Step-by-step guide to finding and leasin: Step-by-step guide to finding and leasing IP addresses for your business.
What is an IP address lease?: What is an IP address lease?
An IP address lease is a temporary agree: An IP address lease is a temporary agreement where you rent IPv4 addresses from a holder for a specified period. This is useful for businesses that need additional IP addresses without the commitment of purchasing them outright.
Pricing is set per IP address per month. For example, if a /24 subnet (256 IPs) is priced at $0.50 per IP, your monthly cost would be $128. Longer lease terms may qualify for discounts.
What is a Letter of Authorization (LOA)?: What is a Letter of Authorization (LOA)?
A Letter of Authorization is an official: A Letter of Authorization is an official document that proves you have permission to use and announce the leased IP addresses. You will need this document to configure BGP routing with your upstream providers.
KYC (Know Your Customer) verification is: KYC (Know Your Customer) verification is a process to verify the identity and legitimacy of companies using our platform. This helps prevent fraud and ensures compliance with regulations. Verification typically takes 1-2 business days.
IP reputation indicates whether an IP ad: IP reputation indicates whether an IP address or range has been associated with spam, malware, or other malicious activities. Clean IPs with high reputation scores are more valuable and less likely to face deliverability issues or blocks.
Can't find what you're looking for? Our: Can't find what you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.
Complete guide to listing your IP addres: Complete guide to listing your IP addresses on our marketplace
As an IP Holder, you can list your unuse: As an IP Holder, you can list your unused IPv4 address ranges on our marketplace and earn passive income by leasing them to businesses that need additional IP addresses.

First, you need to register an account a: First, you need to register an account and complete the company verification process:

Submit your KYC documents for verificati: Submit your KYC documents for verification
You cannot list IP ranges until your com: You cannot list IP ranges until your company is verified. This ensures all IP holders on our platform are legitimate.
Click on \"My Subnets\" in the navigatio: Click on "My Subnets" in the navigation menu
Complete the subnet registration form wi: Complete the subnet registration form with the following information:
Enter the network address of your subnet: Enter the network address of your subnet (e.g., 192.168.1.0)
Select the size of your subnet (/24, /23: Select the size of your subnet (/24, /23, /22, etc.)
Select the Regional Internet Registry wh: Select the Regional Internet Registry where your IPs are registered (RIPE, ARIN, LACNIC, APNIC, AFRINIC)
Specify the country and city where the I: Specify the country and city where the IPs are geolocated
Configure the pricing for your IP addres: Configure the pricing for your IP addresses:
Set a competitive monthly price per IP a: Set a competitive monthly price per IP address. Market rates typically range from $0.40 to $1.00 per IP.
Optionally set a minimum lease duration. Longer terms provide more stable income.
Clean IPs with good reputation can comma: Clean IPs with good reputation can command higher prices
IPs in certain geolocations (US, EU) are: IPs in certain geolocations (US, EU) are typically more valuable
Offering discounts for longer terms can: Offering discounts for longer terms can attract more lessees
After submitting your subnet, our team w: After submitting your subnet, our team will verify your ownership:
We will check the WHOIS records to confi: We will check the WHOIS records to confirm your organization owns the IP range
We verify the IP range is not already li: We verify the IP range is not already listed elsewhere
We run an initial reputation check on th: We run an initial reputation check on the IP addresses
You may be asked to create a specific RI: You may be asked to create a specific RIPE/ARIN object or respond from the abuse contact email
Once verified, your subnet will be liste: Once verified, your subnet will be listed on the marketplace:
Your subnet appears in the marketplace: Your subnet appears in the marketplace

Need additional IPv4 addresses for your: Need additional IPv4 addresses for your business? Our marketplace connects you with verified IP holders who have clean, reputable IP ranges available for lease. This guide will walk you through the process of finding and leasing the perfect IP range for your needs.
Verified, clean IP addresses with good r: Verified, clean IP addresses with good reputation
Letter of Authorization (LOA) for BGP an: Letter of Authorization (LOA) for BGP announcements
24/7 access to your lease management das: 24/7 access to your lease management dashboard
Before you can lease IP addresses, you n: Before you can lease IP addresses, you need to register and verify your company:
Click \"Register\" and create your accou: Click "Register" and create your account with your email
Verify your email address by clicking th: Verify your email address by clicking the link sent to you
Select \"IP Lessee\" as your account typ: Select "IP Lessee" as your account type
Wait for KYC approval (typically 1-2 bus: Wait for KYC approval (typically 1-2 business days)
You can browse the marketplace while wai: You can browse the marketplace while waiting for verification, but you will need an approved account to complete a lease.
Explore available IP ranges and find the: Explore available IP ranges and find the perfect match for your needs:
RIPE (Europe), ARIN (North America), LAC: RIPE (Europe), ARIN (North America), LACNIC (Latin America), APNIC (Asia Pacific), AFRINIC (Africa)

Add to Cart and Configure Lease: Add to Cart and Configure Lease
When you find a subnet you want to lease: When you find a subnet you want to lease:
Click on the subnet to view its details: Click on the subnet to view its details
Select your desired lease duration (1-12: Select your desired lease duration (1-12 months)
Go to your cart to review your selection: Go to your cart to review your selections
Verify the lease terms and total cost: Verify the lease terms and total cost
All payments are processed securely. You: All payments are processed securely. Your payment information is encrypted and never stored on our servers.
After payment, you need to assign your A: After payment, you need to assign your Autonomous System Number (ASN) to the lease:
Go to \"My Leases\" in your dashboard: Go to "My Leases" in your dashboard
You must have a valid ASN to announce th: You must have a valid ASN to announce the leased IP addresses via BGP. If you do not have an ASN, you will need to obtain one from your Regional Internet Registry or use your upstream provider's ASN with their permission.
The Letter of Authorization (LOA) is you: The Letter of Authorization (LOA) is your proof that you are authorized to announce the IP addresses:
From your lease details page, click \"Ge: From your lease details page, click "Generate LOA"
Provide the LOA to your upstream provide: Provide the LOA to your upstream providers or data centers
With your LOA in hand, you can now confi: With your LOA in hand, you can now configure BGP routing:
Provide the LOA to your upstream provide: Provide the LOA to your upstream provider(s)
Configure your router to announce the IP: Configure your router to announce the IP prefix
Verify the announcement using looking gl: Verify the announcement using looking glass tools
Start using your new IP addresses!: Start using your new IP addresses!
Configure your border router to announce: Configure your border router to announce the leased prefix to your upstream providers.
Use tools like bgp.he.net or RIPE RIS to: Use tools like bgp.he.net or RIPE RIS to verify your prefix is being announced correctly.
You can renew your lease at any time bef: You can renew your lease at any time before expiration. We recommend renewing at least 7 days before expiry to ensure continuity.
All invoices are available in your dashb: All invoices are available in your dashboard under "Invoices". You can download PDFs for your accounting records.
You can request early termination of you: You can request early termination of your lease, but refunds are subject to our terms of service. Please contact support for assistance.
